column5: Just wanted to say hello and introduce myself...I am obviously new to the site but was told by a buddy that it is well done.  I will browse around a while before posting too much.  I am an avid fisherman who loves trout fishing but hates eating fish...I have a cottage up in the Ompah area and fish mainly around there.  I live in Carleton Place and fish the Mississippi Lkae and Miss river alot.  Have been fishing since I was 3 with a little stop during highschool cause my friends did not think fishing was the cool thing to do.  Anyway look forward to meeting some of you and sharing some reports if I catch any fish worth reporting.
welcome to OFC, site where we'll catch the fish for you
Welcome to the board Almontefisher!!
welcome aboard, eh
Welcome to OFC, and best of luck out on the water!
Welcome aboard Peter  ....you'll love it here!!...one big happy family..we really like lots of pics and reports...  Steve

Just thought I would post some pics of my catches over the last little while...Enjoy I hope                                  Anyway this is some of my pics..do not want to bore everyone so soon...  Good luck all and thanks for the replies
That's what we like to see, lots of pics. Welcome to the site.
Wow...what a show of multi season, multi species...  You belong here...  What kept you so long ???

Welcome aboard.  You're not too far from where I typicallly spend a week fishing (except this year).   We used to spend a week fishing the Rideau system out of Rideau Ferry.  Been through Carlton Place a couple times, but never stopped to fish.   Again - welcome aboard and looking forward to more fishing reports from that area.
Welcome to the gang Peter   Great intro and you'll fit right in.... after seeing all those pics  from different seasons, can't wait to see your next report.  Keep them coming  Leechman
Welcome aboard ! I fished Mississippi river 2 weeks ago, right of hwy 7, its my resting place on the way to Ottawa. Great looking pics, looking forward to some posts.
Welcome peter!
Welcome aboard. Great intro and photo's.
Welcome abaord !!! great fish porn.  ..cheers
Welcome!  Great Pics!
Welcome neat pics
Welcome to the site Pete,  very well run here and lots of info and reports with pics.  NOW GET OUT THERE AND GET MORE PRIZES FOR THE DERBY, NOT TO MENTION REGISTER PEOPLE!!!!
Welcome aboard! You'll fit in just famously.
Welcome... anyone who posts a pic of "The WGSF" in their first post, obviously belongs here! Welcome and lookin forward to more great pics! HH
Finally came over from the Hawk Community. Welcome aboard.
some nice looking fish, welecome and looking forward to your reports.
Welcome aboard!! Nice looking fish you got there....I walys take 7 over to Ottawa and pass by the lake.. never fished there.. maybe next time I will stop by
